name: Love Spell type Soap Slice
description: Another of our Victoria Secret fragrances. Very popular scent with Summer Flowers and Orange. It actually has a “fruity” tone. Old fashioned ingredients such as Lard- used to produce a hard bar and rich lather. Cocount Oil-same as lard but too much can have a drying effect and brittle bar. Olive Oil-used to keep skin soft, supple, and younger looking. Castor Oil-used to produce great lather and softening qualities to skin. **Sweet Almond Oil-a great skin softener and moisturizer. Dry or irrated skin will benifit from this ingredient. Fragrance oil is used for the beautiful scent and mica is added for coloring. These are made in small batches using the cold process method and then cured for 4 weeks. They will last a looong time if allowed to dry between use. Each bar weighs over 3oz. I accept paypal, Google Merchant, and personal checks. Each bar is shrink wrapped and labeled, ready for you or as a gift. I will combine shipping and give you the best price availible. Please check with the ingredients list to make sure you are not allergic to anything that these are made with.

name: Oatmeal, Milk, & Honey Sugar Scrub
description: This scrub is conditioning as it scrubs away the grime. Best part is it is safe to use everyday. No need for a washcloth, the sugar does the job. Packaged in a 8 ounce jar. This scent is an all time favorite. Delious blend of Oatmeal, Milk, & Honey. This a soft yet refreshing fragrance for both men and women. Please check with the ingredients list to make sure you are not allergic to anything that these are made with. Cold Processed Soap – palm oil, coconut oil, olive oil, sweet almond oil, castor oil Sweet Almond Oil Vitamin E Germaben II (preservative) **Fragrance Oil

name: Gummy Bears Lip Balm
description:
Still be a kid and enjoy the super scent of Gummy Bears.

	Contains lucicous ingredients such as Jojoba Oil, Shea Butter, Mango Butter, Cocoa Butter, Bees wax, Vitamin E Oil, and Castor Oil (add shine)

	This is a product that we have made for years but have just started listing on etsy. We package it in a clear .15 tube. Each tube is shrinkwrapped to ensure that only your nose has sniffed this product.

	We take request for different scents if you would like a flavor not listed, just ask.

	We ship anywhere, just ask for a qoute first. I accept paypal, Google Merchant, and personal checks. I will combine shipping and give you the best price availible.

	Please check with the ingredients list to make sure you are not allergic to anything that these are made with.

name: Endless Love type Soap Slice
description:
Enjoy the romantic soft blend of Summer Flowers, Musk, Lime and Citrus with our newest addition to our “Victoria Secret” types fragrance line of soaps. These scents compare to “Victoria Secrets” Endless Love.

	This soap has the right ingredients to lock in your skins’ moisture with Lard, Olive Oil. We use Castor Oil for a rich lather. High grade Fragrance Oil is used to give a strong, yet soft scent. Pink and purple mica are added to give this bar a swirling effect.

	We mix small (14 bars give or take) at a time. Then they are put on a drying rack for 4 weeks to “cure”. Each bar weighs over 3 1/2 ounces.

	I accept paypal, Google Mercahnt, and personal checks. Each bar is shrink wrapped and labeled, ready for you or as a gift. I will combine shipping and give you the best price availible.

	Please check with the ingredients list to make sure you are not allergic to anything that these are made with.

name: Pink Sugar Goatsmilk Body Lotion
description: Let me tell you about our fabulous lotion body Lotion. This thick, silky, moisturizing cream contains Goats Milk, Aloe, Shea Butter, honey, and other ingredients to give your skin a soft, shimmering feeling. Packaged in a convenient, 8oz bottle with classy pump dispenser. The scent is a light scent of spun sugar, not as sweet as cotton candy. We do not add color to our lotions because, well, why does it need it? Coloring does not do anything to make this product better. If you would like one of these scents, just enter the scent in the comment box. CK-1 (Calvin Klein type) Green Chia Tea Hazelnut Cappuccino Nevys’ Chocolate Spiced Ginger Other scents that are available: Amber Romance type (Victoria Secret) Angel type (Victoria Secret) Baby Powder Bay Rum Blackberry Sage Blueberry Coconut Banana Cucumber Melon Endless Love type (Victoria Secret) Grapefruit Lavender Lemongrass Blend Lilac Love Spell type (Victoria Secret) Mango Oatmeal, Milk, & Honey Patchouli Peachy Pink type (Victoria Secret) Raspberry Sweet Pea Flower Watermelon You will also get a promo card with every lotion purchase. Collect 10 and recieve a free lotion of your choice of scent free. We know what a great product this is and want to show our gratitude to our repeat customers. Even if these are gifts or you resell them, you still get one card per bottle. I will be adding more scents so please visit our store often. I accept paypal, Google Merchant, and personal checks. I will combine shipping and give you the best price availible. Please check with the ingredients list to make sure you are not allergic to anything that these are made with. Ingredients: Water, Glyceryl Stearate, Isopropyl Myristate, Caprylic/Capric Glyceride, Stearic Acid, Stearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceteareth 20, Soybean Oil, Shea Butter, Dimethicone, Sunflower Oil, Aloe Barbadensis, Goat Milk Extract, Hydroxypropyl Trimonium Honey, Benzophenone, Methylparaben, Propylparabaen, DMDM Hydantoin, Triethanolamine Disodium EDTA, and fragrance.
